meanings.sent1: The baby was bealing all night long.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't stop bealing after watching the sad movie.
meanings.sent3: The bealing of the puppy was so loud that it woke up the whole neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like it was bealing uncontrollably with emotion.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm outside sounded like the sky was bealing tears.

meanings.definition: The act of crying loudly and continuously.
meanings.sent1: His bealing echoed through the empty house.
meanings.sent2: The sound of her bealing could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent3: The bealing of the opera singer was so powerful, it moved the audience to tears.
meanings.sent4: The bealing of the wind through the trees sounded like nature's own sorrowful song.
meanings.sent5: The bealing of the violin in the sad melody touched everyone's hearts.
